Pre-Game Insights: Senegal's Nicolas Jackson has been ruled out for the game on Sunday after scans detected a sprained ankle problem on his right foot.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Senegal faces Mauritania in the 2026 FIFA World Cup qualifier on June 9, 2024.
The injury adds to Senegal's long injury list for the World Cup qualifiers in the month of June.
Others: Jackson injured his right ankle during the Senegal-DRC match on June 6, 2024, and radiology examinations revealed a serious sprain of the ankle.
